greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f.: x^2*(3+3*x+x^2) / ( (2*x+1) * (1+x) * (1+x+x^2) * (x^2-x+1) ) .
comment: The derived sequence a(n+1) + 2*a(n) reads 0,3,0,-2,-1,0 (and repeat with period 6).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-3, -3, -3, -3, -3, -2).
results.author: _Paul Curtz_, Nov 07 2009
ext: Edited and extended by _R. J. Mathar_, Nov 12 2009
